TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SrgsRuleRef extends System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement

summary.span: 代表指定規則參考的文法項目。

span.span: Represents the grammar element that specifies a reference to a rule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是特別有用，當您想要重複使用已經定義其內容的項目。The class is particularly useful when you want to reuse an element whose contents have already been defined. 重複使用現有的規則，您可以更快速地建置複雜的文法。By reusing existing rules, you can build complex grammars more quickly. 您可以使用其中一個的建構函式類別，即可參考物件或`rule`項目，如果下列條件為真：You can use one of the constructors of the class to reference an object or a `rule` element if the following is true: - 物件是在包含文法，而其屬性是或。The object is in the containing grammar and the value of its property is or . - `rule`之外部文法和 windows 7 中的項目是其`scope`屬性是`public`。The `rule` element is in an external grammar and the value of its `scope` attribute is `public`. - `rule`之外部文法的值中的項目是其`scope`屬性是`private`，而它被宣告為`root rule`的外部文法。The `rule` element is in an external grammar, the value of its `scope` attribute is `private`, and it is declared as the `root rule` of the external grammar. 此類別代表`ruleref`World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 中所定義的項目[語音辨識文法規格 (SRGS) Version 1.0](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)。This class represents the `ruleref` element as defined in the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761). 如需 SRGS`ruleref`項目和 System.Speech，其支援的詳細資料請參閱[且項目](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/56eb0031-4908-4788-83ab-7c5e19aa4ac0)。For information about the SRGS `ruleref` element and details about its support by System.Speech, see [ruleref Element](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/56eb0031-4908-4788-83ab-7c5e19aa4ac0).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Dictation As SrgsRuleRef

summary.span: 定義可比對語音輸入的規則，如同和此文法相關聯的聽寫主題所定義。

span.span: Defines a rule that can match spoken input as defined by the dictation topic associated with this grammar.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Garbage As SrgsRuleRef

summary.span: 定義可比對任何語音的規則，直到下一個規則相符、下一個語彙基元，或直到語音輸入結束為止。

span.span: Defines a rule that can match any speech up to the next rule match, the next token, or until the end of spoken input.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly MnemonicSpelling As SrgsRuleRef

summary.span: 表示語音輸入可以包含拼字字母，而且拼出字母可辨認為一個字。

span.span: Indicates that speech input can contain spelled-out letters of a word, and that spelled-out letters can be recognized as a word.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Null As SrgsRuleRef

summary.span: 定義在沒有任何音訊輸入時會自動相符的規則。

span.span: Defines a rule that is automatically matched in the absence of any audio input.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Void As SrgsRuleRef

summary.span: 定義可以永遠不會被朗讀出來的規則。

span.span: Defines a rule that can never be spoken.

summary.span: 將 VOID 插入序列中，會自動使該序列無法發音。

span.span: Inserting VOID into a sequence automatically makes that sequence unspeakable.
